jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Work closely with India marketing team and come up with campaign ideas and execute a plan to manage the social media pages. 
  • Understand the behaviour of the target groups and put enough effort to facilitate research to come up with relevant content for the campaigns. 
  • Work closely with market analysts and generate enough data to back up your concepts. 
  • Research recent trends in marketing and social media management and implement them in the designs.
  • Identify shortfalls and opportunities in our current marketing contents and improve it by adding more thoughtful approach.
  • Handle multiple projects at a time, and prioritise some, based on the ever-evolving business needs.

• Strong understanding of communication design fundamentals such as visual storytelling, compositions, colour, design principles etc. 
  • Strong understanding of visual semantics, and content creation.
  • Impressive design communication skills. That's basically the ability to sell a design idea to a born engineer, simply.
  • Strong aesthetic sense of visual design. Can tell great work from good work.
  • Experience in working on illustrative projects - preferable.
